data.name: ResourceFlowDirection
data.comment: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: ResourceLanguage
data.comment: Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language - (NO-TRANSLATION)

data.name: ApplicationName
data.comment: Name of the application. Try to preserve uppercase. - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: PagesLocation
data.comment: Location of the pages of the application - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_TermsOfServiceUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Terms of Service' information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AppKey
data.comment: Each MEGA client application needs a valid key to access the API. Please use a separate key for each of your applications. - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: ThumbnailsDirectory
data.comment: Path of the 'thumbnails' folder of the application - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: PreviewsDirectory
data.comment: Path of the 'previews' folder of the application - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: DownloadsDirectory
data.comment: Path of the 'downloads' folder of the application - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: DiagnosticsEmailAddress
data.comment: Windows Phone Team email for contact and/or support - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: ThumbnailHeight
data.comment: Default thumbnail height - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: ThumbnailWidth
data.comment: Default thumbnail width - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: UploadsDirectory
data.comment: Path of the 'uploads' folder of the application - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_PrivacyPolicyUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Privacy Policy' information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: GoedWareUrl
data.comment: URL to the GoedWare website - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: LogFileName
data.comment: Name of the log file created in DEBUG mode - (NO-TRANSLATION)

data.name: Pro1Month
data.comment: Pro1 monthly subscription

data.name: Pro1Year
data.comment: Pro1 year subscription

data.name: Pro2Month
data.comment: Pro2 monthly subscription

data.name: Pro2Year
data.comment: Pro2 year subscription

data.name: Pro3Month
data.comment: Pro3 monthly subscription

data.name: Pro3Year
data.comment: Pro3 year subscription

data.name: ProLiteMonth
data.comment: ProLite monthly subscription

data.name: ProLiteYear
data.comment: ProLite year subscription

data.name: AccountTypeFree
data.comment: Label for the name of the 'FREE' account type. Try to preserve uppercase - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AccountTypeLite
data.comment: Label for the name of the 'LITE' account type - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AccountTypePro1
data.comment: Label for the name of the 'PRO I' account type. Try to preserve uppercase - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AccountTypePro2
data.comment: Label for the name of the 'PRO II' account type. Try to preserve uppercase - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AccountTypePro3
data.comment: Label for the name of the 'PRO III' account type. Try to preserve uppercase - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_SdkLink
data.comment: Link to respository of the current SDK used in the app - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_SdkVersion
data.comment: Current SDK version used in the app - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_DataProtectionRegulationUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Data Protection Regulation' information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_CopyrightUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Copyright' information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_GeneralLegalUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'General' legal information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_TakedownGuidanceUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Copyright' information web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_MegaUrl
data.comment: URL to MEGA webclient - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: AR_RecoveryUrl
data.comment: URL to the 'Recovery' web page - (NO-TRANSLATION).
